justification: In Study 4 … we had participants complete the Depression, Anxiety and Stress Scale (DASS) as well as the De Jong Gierveld loneliness scale.
Participants in Study 4 completed the Depression, Anxiety and Stress Scale (DASS), which provides separate sub-scores for anxiety, depression and stress.
The article notes that the DASS-21 was administered, a questionnaire specifically designed to measure three constructs: depression, anxiety and stress.
Study 4 … participants completed … the De Jong Gievald loneliness scale (DGLS) to assess feelings of loneliness.
